Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2014 12:10PM eloqui wrote: Hi all-  Any recommended exercises I can find online for lymphedema prevention? I have an axillary seroma and am a few months postop. There are so many different exercises and I am not sure which ones to do! Thanks!
Posts.Title: Kicking LE's butt!! Exercise & Self Care Log Tina337 Flynn

Posts.Content: May 28, 2014 01:38PM eloqui wrote: OP, what did you end up deciding?  My stats are similar to yours: IDC 1.3 cm, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- My Oncotype is 12 and the one oncologist I've seen recommends tamoxifen only. However I'm only 26 years old - does age play into the chemo/no chemo decision?
Posts.Title: Low Oncotype score- Will Chemo give extra insurance? neugirl voraciousreader

Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2015 12:51PM eloqui wrote: Resurrecting this old thread, but this has happened to me too, and I think it's weird. I used to get colds all the time, and now after chemo I can hang around sick people and not develop a cold. Maybe there is some residual immunosuppression after the chemo and we just aren't exhibiting symptoms?
Posts.Title: Colds, Flu, - not me, I had chemo clariceak beth1965
Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
